#!/usr/bin/env ruby
content = $stdin.read()
numbers = [] moneyregex = /\$([0-9]+(\.[0-9]{2})?)\b/ content.each_line() do |line| match = moneyregex.match(line) while match numbers << match[1] match = moneyregex.match(match.post_match) end end
fp = IO.popen("bc -l", 'r+') fp.puts(numbers.join(' + ')) answer = fp.gets() fp.close()
puts " = #{answer}"
